title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: lightweight, extensible framework for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other LLMs locally via a simple CLI and REST API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, list & pull models from Node or browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, list, copy, delete models with async support.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama; drop-in LLM & chat model for chains, agents, RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style); chat history, model manager, multimodal, RAG, user auth.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; sync/async APIs, streaming, embeddings, model management.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI for Ollama with syntax highlighting, history, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Turn Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style code-completion backend for VS Code and Neovim.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Plug-and-play RAG stack: Ollama + Chroma + LangChain + Gradio UI for private document Q&A.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and autoscaling.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix derivation for Ollama; reproducible installs on NixOS with CUDA and ROCm variants.

title: ollama-models
summary: Official Modelfile collection (Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, CodeLlama, etc.) maintained by Ollama team.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-host Discord bot that answers questions using any Ollama model; slash commands, thread support.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt bot that streams Ollama responses in threads with @bot mentions and DM support.

title: ollama-distroless
summary: Official distroless container image (ghcr.io/ollama/ollama) for minimal, secure deployments.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with async streaming, embeddings, and model management; NuGet package.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing async wrappers for Ollama REST API; chat, generate, pull, list, embeddings.

title: ollama-zig
summary: Zig client library for Ollama with comptime JSON parsing and async I/O.

title: ollama-ray
summary: Ray Serve integration for scaling Ollama models across GPU nodes with autoscaling and batching.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration for Ollama; use local LLMs in Haystack pipelines for RAG & agents.
